Jeroen Van Goey

Just Another Genome Hacker

About Me

Fascinated by the intersection of AI and science. Working on Machine Learning for personalized cancer vaccines, de novo peptide sequencing and signal peptides.

Bluesky | GitHub | LinkedIn

Projects

InstaNovo

De novo peptide sequencing with InstaNovo: Accurate, database-free peptide identification for large scale proteomics experiments

Snakes and Sequences: Senegalese Serpent Venom Sequencing Hackathon

This hackathon focused on improving the predictions of the de novo peptide sequencing model IsntaNovo using filtering and recalibration on a dataset of Snakes present in Africa.

Desert locust breeding ground prediction hackathon

A machine learning hackathon to predict desert locust breeding grounds using remote sensing data and to improve model performance on the Zindi leaderboard.

euler

My solutions to Project Euler.

adventofcode

My solutions to Advent of Code.
